title: Delhi discoms, UP's NPCL top performance ratings of power distribution companies
description: As per the recent ratings announced by the power ministry, NPCL, BRPL, BYPL, and TPDDL have emerged as the top performers among all the 62 rated power distribution companies (discoms) in the country. These discoms have achieved the highest rating of A+.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
